Distilled perspective field #3
R5 - Objects made of paper pulp
R5.2 - Paper pulp is drained and pressed, and then rolled in a plastic bucket until it forms individual clumps.
Distilled perspective fields are made by sifting the R5.2s into six different sizes, which are arranged to create the illusion of perspective.
R5.2.3 - This piece is part of a collective work: T47.1 Ozymandius Principal
R5.2.3

2003
paper pulp
5" x 60" x 120"
